about_the_game:
Expand the WARNO battlefields for free with the new Kreide map as part of Reinforcement Pack #6.

The Kreide battlefield captures the quintessential essence of Travemünde, a relaxed Baltic Sea resort and ferry port on the border between West and East Germany. Inspired by the landscapes of Northern Germany, the Kreide map combines dense urban sectors with hills and windswept plains.

Kreide is playable across WARNO’s various modes, such as single-player Skirmish, cooperative, or competitive multiplayer, including 1vs1, 3vs3, and 10vs10 online battles.

Reinforcement Pack #6 is available for free for all owners of WARNO.

legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: WARNO - RP #6 - Kreide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Expand the WARNO battlefields for free with the massive new Kreide map, inspired by Northern Germany’s Baltic Sea shoreline, as featured in the Reinforcement Pack #6.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
